exports.handler = async (event, context) => {
  try {
    event.response = {
      claimsOverrideDetails: {
        claimsToAddOrOverride: {
          attribute_key2: "attribute_value2",
          attribute_key: "attribute_value",
        },
        claimsToSuppress: ["email"],
      },
    };
  } catch (err) {
    // Return to Amazon Cognito
    return null;
  }
};
